back_flavor: Zoey had known that she was special ever since God spoke to her one night when she was six years old... the night that terrible fire took away her parents. He told her that He had chosen her from among all the people of the world to be His agent. She would protect the innocent and punish the wicked. Since then, He comes to her in times of trouble, offering guidance and comfort. Zoey now travels from city to city, taking work as a chef to support herself. When she isn't working, she stalks the night, guided by the Lord's voice. Wherever she finds wickedness, she strikes it down without remorse or hesitation.
back_text: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five level 0 cards from any other class. Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Zoey's Cross, Smite the Wicked, 1 random basic weakness.
flavor: God has spoken. I will do His work without hesitation.
name: Zoey Samaras
text:
[reaction] After you become engaged with an enemy: Gain 1 resource.
[eldersign] effect: +1. If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage.

back_text: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five level 0 cards from any other class. Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): 1 random basic weakness.
flavor: No, not quiet at all. Dead folks get downright rambunctious when I play my horn.
name: Jim Culver
text:
Treat the modifier on [skull] tokens you reveal as "0."
Anytime you reveal a [eldersign] token, you may choose to instead treat it as a [skull] token.
[eldersign] effect: +1.

name: Zoey's Cross
text:
Zoey Samaras deck only.
[reaction] After an enemy becomes [...], exhaust Zoey's Cross and [...]: Deal 1 damage to that enemy.

name: Teamwork
text: Investigators at your location may give or trade any number of Item assets, Ally assets, or resources among one another.

name: Double or Nothing
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
Double the difficulty of this skill test. If this skill test is successful, resolve the effects of the successful test twice.

name: Rite of Seeking
text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [lore]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If a [skull], [cultist], [thing], [monster], or [fail] symbol is revealed during this test, after this test resolves lose all remaining actions and immediately end your turn.

name: Internal Injury
text: Revelation - Place Internal Injury into play in your threat area. [reaction] At the end of your turn: Take 1 direct damage. [action][action]: Discard Internal Injury.
